s.text: But as was reported somewhat tentatively on Sept. 25 in Salon and subsequently confirmed elsewhere, the story almost certainly isn't true.
What investigators now believe really happened is that another girl, Valeen Schnurr, was shot in both arms and then asked if she believed in God.
Shortly after the shooting, the horrifying story spread that before she was shot, one of the two killers asked her if she believed in God.
